name: generateGraphQLModels
description: This generates models for all queries, mutations, and subscriptions. Call this method every time if there is a change in the query or you've added a new query in the GraphQL file.

links.title: GraphQL in ColdFusion
links.description: Overview of GraphQL, including how to use it in ColdFusion

examples.title: Generate GraphQL models (Script syntax)
examples.description: Creates a GraphQL client with specified properties and calls generateGraphQLModels
